title: Syrupy herbal formulation of green bean pod extract of Phaseolus vulgaris L.: Formulation optimization by central composite design, and evaluation for anti-urolithiatic activity
content:
Publication date: 15 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 5

Author(s): K.M. Noorulla, Debesa Doyo Dalecha, Misbahu Jemal Haji, Roshan S, Manikandan Arumugam, Ameeduzzafar Zafar, Wondesen Gadisa Gobena, Shimelis Mekit, Hussein Haji Negawo, Mohammednur Hussein, Hailu Fekadu Demessie, Mohd Yasir
